lead_paragraph: The Mexican government said Tuesday evening that it would not be investigating the actors Sean Penn or Kate del Castillo.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Mexico: Actors Who Met Guzmán Are Not Targets of Inquiry
headline.main: Mexico: Actors Who Met El Chapo Are Not Targets of Inquiry

snippet: The Mexican government said Tuesday evening that it would not be investigating the actors Sean Penn or Kate del Castillo.
abstract: Mexican government announces that it will not investigate actors Sean Penn and Kate del Castillo, who met with drug lord Joaquin Guzman Loera.
